content: पुंडरीकं {@--1@} A lotus-flower, especially a white lotus: <ls>U. 6. 12</ls>, <ls n="U. 6.">29</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A white parasol. {@--3@} A medicine, drug. --कः {@--1@} The white colour. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the elephant presiding over the south-east direction: <ls>R. 18. 8.</ls> {@--3@} A tiger. {@--4@} A kind of serpent. {@--5@} A species of rice. {@--6@} A kind of leprosy. {@--7@} A fever in an elephant. {@--8@} A kind of mango tree. {@--9@} A pitcher, water-pot. {@--10@} Fire {@--11@} A (sectarial) mark on the fore-head.
